shorts.title: Former Olympian, record holder Ryun to visit NEPA Camp
shorts.title_distilled: Former Olympian, record holder Ryun to visit NEPA Camp.
shorts.description: Legendary Olympian Jim Ryun returns to Northeast Pennsylvania to offer words of inspiration at Rock Mountain Camp in Gibson, Susquehanna County. Ryun, a former Olympic silver medal winner and the first high school athlete to run a mile in under 4 minutes, is a guest speaker at the Running Ahrens Cross Country Camp on Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. The event, which includes a meet-and-greet, is free and open to the community. Last summer, Ryun also spoke at the camp. A three-time Olympian, he qualified for the 1964 games at 17 years old, and in 1968, Ryun won the silver medal […]
shorts.content: Legendary Olympian Jim Ryun returns to Northeast Pennsylvania to offer words of inspiration at Rock Mountain Camp in Gibson, Susquehanna County. Ryun, a former Olympic silver medal winner and the first high school athlete to run a mile in under 4 minutes, is a guest speaker at the Running Ahrens Cross Country Camp on Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. The event, which includes a meet-and-greet, is free and open to the community. Last summer, Ryun also spoke at the camp. A three-time Olympian, he qualified for the 1964 games at 17 years old, and in 1968, Ryun won the silver medal […]
shorts.content_distilled: Legendary Olympian Jim Ryun returns to Northeast Pennsylvania to offer words of inspiration at Rock Mountain Camp in Gibson, Susquehanna County.

shorts.title: Best bets: 5 things to do this weekend
shorts.title_distilled: Best bets: 5 things to do this weekend.
shorts.description: Lebanese-American Food Festival Go to St. Joseph Melkite Greek-Catholic Church on St. Frances Cabrini Avenue in Scranton for stuffed grape leaves, kibbie, kabobs, baklava, potato pancakes and other dishes. The Lebanese-American Food Festival is from 4-9 p.m. on Friday and Saturday and from 1-7 p.m. on Sunday. Takeout is available. Eagles tribute in Hazleton The free concert with ​Winslow — An Evening of the Eagles and opening act Six Shots is Friday at City View Park, 700 S. Poplar St. The grounds open at 5 p.m, with food trucks and other vendors. The bands begin at 6. hazletonparks.com/rockinthemountain Ozzy Osbourne […]

shorts.title: Bonus prizes from community for Capt. Minicozzi Memorial Race
shorts.title_distilled: Bonus prizes from community for Capt.
shorts.description: Bonus prizes will be awarded in addition to trophies and medals during the 13th annual Capt. James R. Minicozzi Memorial Race, through the UNICO Scranton Chapter. The race takes place Aug. 30 at 10 a.m. in downtown Scranton during La Festa Italiana. Preregister for $25 or donate at runsignup.com/Minicozzi until Aug. 25. The first 100 participants are guaranteed a race T-shirt. Bonus prizes are awarded to the overall male and female walker, overall male and female runner and overall military finisher. Bonus prizes are also awarded to the top three male and female runners and the top runner in each […]
shorts.content: Bonus prizes will be awarded in addition to trophies and medals during the 13th annual Capt. James R. Minicozzi Memorial Race, through the UNICO Scranton Chapter.
